extendedInfo.detail: 50 calories per serving.  Contains a bioengineered food ingredient.  Sauced. Fits your lifestyle and your freezer. Green Giant. Simply Steam. Vegetables are not only delicious, they come in freezer-friendly, easy-to-stack boxes, with a microwavable pouch inside. Great for a meal, side dish or snack-anytime. More great ways to get your daily veggies. Join the biggest veggie fans online.  No artificial flavors or preservatives. Smartlabel: Scan for more food information. Join the biggest veggie fans online (at)greengiant. greengiant.com. Facebook. Instagram. Twitter. Pinterest.  Questions or comments? 1-800-754-3381.
extendedInfo.ingredients: Cauliflower, Water, Modified Corn Starch, Contains Less Than 2% Of Cheddar Cheese (Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Parmesan Cheese (Pasteurized Milk, Cheese Cultures, Salt, Enzymes), Ricotta Cheese (Whey, Milkfat, Lactic Acid, Salt), Autolyzed Yeast Extract, Butter (Cream, Natural Flavor), Buttermilk, Dextrose, Garlic Powder, Hydrolyzed Corn Protein, Lactic Acid, Modified Whey, Natural Flavor, Onion Powder, Paprika And Annatto Extract (Color), Salt, Sodium Alginate, Sodium Phosphate, Sunflower Oil, Torula Yeast, Whey, Whey Protein Concentrate, Xanthan Gum, Yeast Extract.
extendedInfo.directions: Microwave (Recommended Method): 1. Remove pouch from carton. Place pouch, printed side up, on microwavable plate. Do not cut slit in pouch. 2. Microwave on high according to chart until thoroughly cooked. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.) 1200; Time on high 4 1/2 to 5 min. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.) 1000; Time on high 6 to 7 min. Microwave wattage (Wattage vary; adjust time for your microwave. Do not leave microwave unattended.) 700; Time on high 8 to 8 1/2 min. 3. Let stand 1 minute. Caution: Hot! Pull or cut to open. Empty into serving dish; stir. Stove-Top: Important: do not heat pouch in boiling water. 1. Empty contents of pouch into 2-quart nonstick saucepan. 2. Cover; cook over medium heat 10 to 15 minutes, breaking up and stirring occasionally. Must cook thoroughly- see cook instructions. Simply Steam (Microwave right in the bag). Cooking Directions: For food safety and quality, follow the directions. Before eating, cook thoroughly to at least 165 degree F. Keep frozen until ready to cook. Do not thaw. Adjust cook times and heat settings as needed. Refrigerate leftovers.  Keep frozen.  Push here.  Best if used by.
